verses.text: A Song \add and\add* Psalm for the sons of Korah. Great \add is\add* the LORD, and greatly to be praised in the city of our God, \add in\add* the mountain of his holiness.
Beautiful for situation, the joy of the whole earth, \add is\add* mount Zion, \add on\add* the sides of the north, the city of the great King.
God is known in her palaces for a refuge.
For lo, the kings were assembled, they passed by together.
They saw \add it\add* , \add and\add* so they wondered; they were troubled, \add and\add* hasted away.
Fear took hold upon them there, \add and\add* pain, as of a woman in travail.
Thou breakest the ships of Tarshish with an east wind.
As we have heard, so have we seen in the city of the LORD of hosts, in the city of our God: God will establish it for ever. Selah.
We have thought of thy loving-kindness, O God, in the midst of thy temple.
According to thy name, O God, so \add is\add* thy praise to the ends of the earth: thy right hand is full of righteousness.
Let mount Zion rejoice, let the daughters of Judah be glad, because of thy judgments.
Walk about Zion, and go round her: number her towers.
Mark ye well her bulwarks, consider her palaces; that ye may tell \add it\add* to the generation following.
For this God \add is\add* our God for ever and ever: he will be our guide \add even\add* to death.
